description:
This episode is a flashback to Rio`s first days with Team Warrior. Maki first meets Rio working behind the counter in a convenience store to earn extra money for her debts. She witnesses her fighting skills as Rio takes down a thief who`s trying to rob the store. After putting Rio through some tests, Maki asks her to join. Rio refuses. What can Maki do to convince Rio that Team Warrior is the best place for her?
Source Wiki

titles.title: ランボー! ブラボー! 利緒ビンボー!
